sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Customer, 4 - Update Record➛...➛Purchaser

Your order for Plant 4 - Update Record➛...➛Numberhas been approved. It will be delivered in 4-5 days maximum. 

Thank you for your purchase!

Dear Customer, 10 - Update Record➛...➛Purchaser

We are sorry to announce that your order for Plant 10 - Update Record➛...➛Number has been rejected by the seller. Try to choose another plant or contact the seller 10 - Update Record➛...➛Plant owner for additional details.
